price: Indeed, they are my enemies, except the Lord of the worlds[12],
arabic: فَإِنَّهُمۡ عَدُوّٞ لِّيٓ إِلَّا رَبَّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
footnotes: [12] As they worshiped idols in addition to worshiping Allah.
